page.title: 15CLUBS
page.content: THE VILLAGE IS QUITE WELL SERVED BY CLUBS FROM THE YOUNG CHURCH, UNDER THE AUSPICES OF THE PARISH CHURCH TO THE GOOD COMPANIONS, WHERE SENIOR CITIZENS MEET MONTHLY, IN ADDITION TO OUTINGS ETC. ALTHOUGH APPARENTLY DEFUNCT A YOUTH CLUBIS REVISED FROM TIME TO TIME.OUTDOOR PURSUITS ARE REPRESENTED BY THE TENNIS CLUB WHICH HAS TWO EXCELLENT HARD COURTS ADJACENT TO A SPACIOUS RECREATION GROUND WHEREON THE FOOTBALL CLUB FUNCTIONS IN THE SEASON. WOMENS GROUPS COMPRISE OF THE WOMENS INSTITUTE AND THE WIVES GROUP, WHILST BOTH SEXES ENJOY MEMBERSHIP OF DARTS TEAMS; ONE FOR EACH OF THE PUBS, AND ONE FOR THE W.I. SOME GIRLS BELONG TO THE GUIDES BUT GO BEYOND THE VILLAGE TO WITTERSHAM FOR MEMBERSHIP.
